Uses of Package
mhframework.tilemap

    Package Description
    mhframework  
    mhframework.ai.path  
    mhframework.media  
    mhframework.tilemap  
  • Classes in mhframework.tilemap used by mhframework 
    Class and Description
    MHTileSetManager
    This class manages the complete collection of all the tilesets in a game.
  • Classes in mhframework.tilemap used by mhframework.ai.path 
    Class and Description
    MHMapCellAddress
    Data storage class used to simplify the passing of map coordinates around as parameters.
    MHTileMap
    Base class for deriving tile-based map objects.
    MHTileMapDirection 
  • Classes in mhframework.tilemap used by mhframework.media 
    Class and Description
    MHTileSetManager
    This class manages the complete collection of all the tilesets in a game.
  • Classes in mhframework.tilemap used by mhframework.tilemap 
    Class and Description
    MHIsometricMap
    Abstract base class for deriving isometric tile maps.
    MHIsoMouseMap
    Mouse map for isometric tile maps.
    MHMap
    Maintains data for a grid-based game map.
    MHMapCell
    A single cell in the map grid (MHMap).
    MHMapCellAddress
    Data storage class used to simplify the passing of map coordinates around as parameters.
    MHMapFileInfo
    This is the information that gets written to a file by LIME.
    MHObjectFactory
    This interface is to be implemented by the class in your game that is responsible for taking a tile ID and returning a special non-static object.
    MHTileMap
    Base class for deriving tile-based map objects.
    MHTileMapDirection
